column2: COLORADO DMV DRIVING TEST
Question Text
1. Which of the following is NOT true about ABS?
column4: It helps increase your stopping distance.

column2: 2. Drivers can not pass a vehicle on the left if:
column4: their lane has a solid yellow center line.
column6: they can not safely return to the right lane before any oncoming vehicle comes within 200 feet of them.
column8: they approach a curve on a two-way road and can not see around it.

column2: 3. At intersections marked with stop lines, drivers must:
column6: enter the intersection and then stop.
column8: slow down and enter the intersection.

column2: 4. _________________ your mirrors when you prepare to change lanes.
column8: It is not recommended to check

column2: 5. This road sign means:
column10: You may turn right after yielding the right-of-way to oncoming traffic

column2: 6. You face a green light, but traffic on the other side of the intersection does not allow you to travel all the way through the intersection. What must you do?
column4: Wait until traffic ahead clears, so you do not block the intersection.
column8: Enter the intersection and wait until traffic ahead clears.
column10: Wait for the next green light.

column2: 7. Which of the following does NOT affect the distance that it takes to stop your vehicle?
8. You must pull over to the edge of the road and allow an emergency vehicle to pass:
column4: only if the emergency vehicle is following you.
column8: only if the emergency vehicle is approaching.

column2: 9. Following another vehicle too closely is known as:
10. Doing all you can to prevent crashes is called:
11. The picture shows a _________ sign.
12. If you are blinded by headlights on an approaching vehicle, you should:
column4: use the road edge as a guide until the approaching vehicle passes by.
column6: flash your headlights to high beam for a second, then return to low beam.
column8: move your eyes to the right.

column2: 13. After stopping for a school bus that is unloading children you should:
column4: watch for children walking along the side of the road.

column2: 14. A flashing red light:
column4: means that you must bring your vehicle to a complete halt.
column8: means the same thing as a stop sign.

column2: 15. This sign indicates:
column4: the entrance to a construction site.
column6: that you must yield the right-of-way.
column8: that you must not drive past this sign.
column10: the entrance to a dead-end street.

column2: 16. Which of the following must you obey over the others?
17. A red traffic sign means?
18. This road sign means:
column4: Traffic is entering from another road, drive with caution

column2: 19. At a school crossing, drivers should:
column4: watch for children and be ready to stop.
column6: always sound their horn and stay alert.
column8: None of the other answers is correct.
column10: always stop, whether there’s a stop sign or not.

column2: 20. This road sign means:
column8: Watch for vehicles entering from the side

column2: 21. If a vehicle is approaching with high beams, drivers should look __________ until the vehicle passes.
column4: to the right of the road
column6: at the center of the road
column8: to the left of the road

column2: 22. You must come to a full stop at a yield sign:
column4: Before you decrease speed and reach the intersection.

column2: 23. This road sign means:
24. What does a flashing left yellow arrow mean?
column4: Left turns are allowed. Yield to oncoming traffic and pedestrians.
column6: Vehicles turning left must stop if they can. The light will soon be red.

column2: 25. This warning sign means:
column6: Watch out for children crossing the street
column8: Slow down, drive with caution and watch for children
